channel.title: Problem with \savegames\*.dat files
channel.description: Hello Guys, i downloaded a 317 blank source server now i would change the admin privilegs but i cant open the .dat files in the directory.. i need help pls

item.title: Problem with \savegames\*.dat files
item.dc:creator: @ProTayToe ProTayToe
item.description:
@ProTayToe wrote:

Just find your staffRights method and add something similar to this:

public int getStaffRights() { if (getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR NAME HERE")) { return 3; } return staffRights; }

This basically says if a player with a certain name logs in, set their player rights to 3. Find something similar to this in your source, should be in player.java

Read full topic
